job_history.work_description: Utilized understanding of necessary disease states to deliver strong technical and scientific presentations to influence customers in the St. Louis market to increase prescriptions for products such as Toviaz, Viagra, Chantix, Spiriva, Lipitor, Caduet, Exubera, Pristiq, and Premarin Vaginal Cream. Maintained knowledge of current trends in industry including Meaningful Use, ACO and PCMHs. Met established call averages and expectations to achieve sales performance expectations.

Core focus was analyzing customer needs to effectively establish and develop customer base leading to an increase in revenues by 24% in 2004, 41% in 2005 and 35% in 2006. Marketed courier solutions to the St. Louis Metro area and managed the entire sales cycle, including, key presentations to senior level management, working directly with clients to establish and sustain competitive pricing and closing sales.

skills.name: Sales Performance
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in sales roles, consistently meeting and exceeding performance expectations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Customer Relationship Management
skills.explanation: Proven track record of establishing and developing customer bases, resulting in significant revenue increases, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Presentation Skills
skills.explanation: Utilized strong technical and scientific presentation skills to influence customers, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Industry Knowledge
skills.explanation: Maintained knowledge of current trends in the healthcare industry, including Meaningful Use, ACO, and PCMHs, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Served as Vice President, managing sales cycles, and working directly with clients, suggesting strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication Skills
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with customers, clients, and senior-level management, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Human Resource Development and Management
skills.explanation: Earned a Master's degree in Human Resource Development and Management, but no direct work experience is mentioned, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: No direct experience in project management is mentioned, but some transferable skills may be applicable.
